document_data.name: Thran
document_data.mainbody: '''Thran''' was the leader of the watch guard in [[Freedale]] in the [[Dalelands]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Under Thran's leadership, groups of two guardsmen always patrolled the town.
document_data.Relationships: Aside from being the leader of the guards, Thran was friends with [[Beldar]] the Brave, who could stay over as long as he was available for support when needed.
